subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we accepted your appication
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS NIGHT):
$214,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this short form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://storeasupsmore.com/
